EPH	4	<<	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8260	EPHESIANS CHP 4
EPH	4	1	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8261	" {1} I therefore, the prisoner in the Lord, beg you to walk worthily of the calling with which you were called."
EPH	4	2	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8262	" {2} Walk with all lowliness and humility, with patience, bearing with one another in love."
EPH	4	3	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8263	 {3} Be eager to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.
EPH	4	4	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8264	" {4} There is one body, and one Spirit, even as you also were called in one hope of your calling;"
EPH	4	5	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8265	" {5} one Lord, one faith, one baptism,"
EPH	4	6	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8266	" {6} one God and Father of all, who is over all, and through all, and in us all."
EPH	4	7	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8267	" {7} But to each one of us was the grace given according to the measure of the gift of Christ. {8} Therefore he says,"
EPH	4	8	Scripture Quote-FX1	#13		8268	" “When he ascended on high, he led captivity captive, and gave gifts to men.”"
EPH	4	9	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8269	" {9} Now this, “He ascended,“ what is it but that he also first descended into the lower parts of the earth?"
EPH	4	10	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8270	" {10} He who descended is the one who also ascended far above all the heavens, that he might fill all things."
EPH	4	11	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8271	" {11} He gave some to be apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, shepherds and teachers;"
EPH	4	12	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8272	" {12} for the perfecting of the saints, to the work of serving, to the building up of the body of Christ;"
EPH	4	13	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8273	" {13} until we all attain to the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God,"
EPH	4	13	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8274	" to a full grown man, to the measure of the stature of the fullness of Christ."
EPH	4	14	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8275	" {14} Then we will no longer be like children, tossed back and forth,"
EPH	4	14	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8276	" carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the trickery of men, in craftiness, after the wiles of error."
EPH	4	15	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8277	" {15} Speaking truth in love, we may grow up in all things into him, who is the head, Christ."
EPH	4	16	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8278	" {16} It is from Christ that all the body, being fitted and knit together through that which every joint supplies,"
EPH	4	16	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8279	" according to the working in measure of each individual part, makes the body increase to the building up of itself in love."
EPH	4	17	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8280	" {17} This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that you no longer walk as the rest of the Gentiles also walk, in the futility of their mind,"
EPH	4	18	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8281	" {18} being darkened in their understanding, alienated from the life of God, because of the ignorance that is in them, because of the hardening of their hearts."
EPH	4	19	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8282	" {19} Having become callous, they gave themselves up to lust, to work all uncleanness with greediness."
EPH	4	20	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8283	 {20} But you did not learn Christ that way;
EPH	4	21	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8284	" {21} If indeed you heard him, and were taught in him, even as truth is in Jesus,"
EPH	4	22	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8285	" {22} put away your former way of life, the old man that grows corrupt after the lusts of deceit;"
EPH	4	23	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8286	" {23} Be renewed in the spirit of your mind,"
EPH	4	24	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8287	" {24} and put on the new man, who in the likeness of God has been created in righteousness and holiness of truth."
EPH	4	25	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8288	" {25} Therefore putting away falsehood, speak truth each one with his neighbor. For we are members of one another."
EPH	4	26	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8289	" {26} “Be angry, and don't sin.”"
EPH	4	26	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8290	" Don't let the sun go down on your wrath, {27} neither give place to the devil."
EPH	4	28	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8291	" {28} Let him who stole steal no more; but rather let him labor, working with his hands the thing that is good,"
EPH	4	28	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8292	 that he may have something to give to him who has need.
EPH	4	29	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8293	" {29} Let no corrupt speech proceed out of your mouth, but such as is good for building up as the need may be, that it may give grace to those who hear."
EPH	4	30	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8294	" {30} Don't grieve the Holy Spirit of God, in whom you were sealed for the day of redemption."
EPH	4	31	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8295	" {31} Let all bitterness, wrath, anger, outcry, and slander, be put away from you, with all malice."
EPH	4	32	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8296	" {32} And be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving each other, just as God also in Christ forgave you. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
EPH	5	<<	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8297	EPHESIANS CHP 5
EPH	5	1	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8298	" {1} Be therefore imitators of God, as beloved children."
EPH	5	2	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8299	" {2} Walk in love, even as Christ also loved you, and gave himself up for us, an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweet-smelling fragrance."
EPH	5	3	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8300	" {3} But sexual immorality, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not even be mentioned among you, as becomes saints."
EPH	5	4	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8301	" {4} Do not be guilty of filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not appropriate; but rather give thanks to God."
EPH	5	5	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8302	" {5} Know this for sure, that no sexually immoral person, nor unclean person,"
EPH	5	5	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8303	" nor covetous man, who is an idolater, has any inheritance in the Kingdom of Christ and God."
EPH	5	6	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8304	" {6} Let no one deceive you with empty words. For because of these things, the wrath of God comes on the children of disobedience."
EPH	5	7	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8305	 {7} Therefore don't be partakers with them.
EPH	5	8	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8306	" {8} For you were once darkness, but are now light in the Lord. Walk as children of light."
EPH	5	9	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8307	" {9} The fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth,"
EPH	5	10	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8308	 {10} proving what is well pleasing to the Lord.
EPH	5	11	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8309	" {11} Have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather even reprove them."
EPH	5	12	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8310	" {12} For the things which are done by them in secret, it is a shame even to speak of."
EPH	5	13	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8311	" {13} But all things, when they are reproved, are revealed by the light, for everything that reveals is light. {14} Therefore he says,"
EPH	5	14	Scripture Quote-FX1	#13		8312	" “Awake, you who sleep, and arise from the dead, and Christ will shine on you.”"
EPH	5	15	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8313	" {15} Therefore watch carefully how you walk, not as unwise, but as wise;"
EPH	5	16	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8314	" {16} redeeming the time, because the days are evil."
EPH	5	17	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8315	" {17} Therefore don't be foolish, but understand what the will of the Lord is."
EPH	5	18	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8316	" {18} Don't be drunken with wine, in which is dissipation, but be filled with the Spirit."
EPH	5	19	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8317	" {19} Speak to one another in psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs; singing, and making melody in your heart to the Lord."
EPH	5	20	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8318	" {20} Give thanks always concerning all things in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, to God, even the Father."
EPH	5	21	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8319	 {21} Subject yourselves one to another in the fear of Christ.
EPH	5	22	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8320	" ||| DO NOT COMBINE |||*~*{Music--Ends before v22}*~**~* {22} Wives, be subject to your own husbands, as to the Lord."
EPH	5	23	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8321	" {23} For the husband is the head of the wife, and Christ also is the head of the assembly, being himself the savior of the body."
EPH	5	24	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8322	" {24} But as the assembly is subject to Christ, so let the wives also be to their own husbands in everything."
EPH	5	25	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8323	" {25} Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the assembly, and gave himself up for it."
EPH	5	26	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8324	" {26} He did this to sanctify it, having cleansed it by the washing of water with the word,"
EPH	5	27	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8325	" {27} that he might present the assembly to himself gloriously, not having spot or wrinkle or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish."
EPH	5	28	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8326	 {28} Even so husbands also ought to love their own wives as their own bodies. He who loves his own wife loves himself.
EPH	5	29	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8327	" {29} For no man ever hated his own flesh; but nourishes and cherishes it, even as the Lord also does the assembly;"
EPH	5	30	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8328	" {30} because we are members of his body, of his flesh and bones."
EPH	5	31	Scripture Quote-FX1	#13		8329	" {31} “For this cause a man will leave his father and mother, and will be joined to his wife. The two will become one flesh.”"
EPH	5	32	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8330	" {32} This mystery is great, but I speak concerning Christ and of the assembly."
EPH	5	33	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8331	" {33} Nevertheless each of you must also love his own wife even as himself; and let the wife see that she respects her husband. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"

EPH	6	6	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8339	" {6} Do not work hard only when eyes are on you, as men pleasers; but as servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart."

EPH	6	9	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8343	" knowing that he who is both their Master and yours is in heaven, and there is no partiality with him."
EPH	6	10	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8344	" {10} Finally, be strong in the Lord, and in the strength of his might."

EPH	6	13	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8348	" {13} Therefore put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to withstand in the evil day, and, having done all, to stand."
EPH	6	14	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8349	" {14} Stand therefore, having the utility belt of truth buckled around your waist, and having put on the breastplate of righteousness,"

EPH	6	16	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8351	" {16} above all, taking up the shield of faith, with which you will be able to quench all the fiery darts of the evil one."
EPH	6	17	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8352	" {17} And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God;"
EPH	6	18	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8353	" {18} With all prayer and requests, pray at all times in the Spirit, and be watchful to this end in all perseverance and requests for all the saints:"
EPH	6	19	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8354	" {19} Pray for me also, that I might speak without fear. Pray that I will use the right words to explain these difficult concepts in the Gospel."
EPH	6	20	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8355	 {20} I was sent to be an ambassador. Currently I am in chains for preaching the Gospel.
EPH	6	20	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8356	" I want to keep on speaking for Christ without fear, the way I should."
EPH	6	21	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8357	" {21} That you also may know my affairs, how I am doing."
EPH	6	21	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8358	" Tychicus, the beloved brother and faithful servant in the Lord, will make known to you all things."
EPH	6	22	Narr_010: Ephesians	#19		8359	" {22} I have sent to you for this very purpose, that you may know our state, and that he may comfort your hearts."

PHP	1	<<	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8362	"PHILIPPIANS*~*PHILIPPIANS CHP 1"
PHP	1	1	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8363	" {1} Paul and Timothy, servants of Jesus Christ; To all the saints in Christ Jesus who are at Philippi, with the overseers and servants:"
PHP	1	2	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8364	" {2} Grace to you, and peace from God, our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ."
PHP	1	3	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8365	" {3} I thank my God whenever I remember you,"
PHP	1	4	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8366	 {4} always in every request of mine on behalf of you all making my requests with joy.
PHP	1	5	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8367	 {5} I thank God for your partnership in furtherance of the Good News from the first day until now.
PHP	1	6	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8368	" {6} I am confident of this very thing, that he who began a good work in you will complete it until the day of Jesus Christ."
PHP	1	7	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8369	" {7} It is even right for me to think this way on behalf of all of you, because I have you in my heart."
PHP	1	7	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8370	" Both in my bonds and in the defense and confirmation of the Good News, you all are partakers with me of grace."
PHP	1	8	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8371	" {8} For God is my witness, how I long after all of you in the tender mercies of Christ Jesus."
PHP	1	9	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8372	" {9} This I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and all discernment."
PHP	1	10	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8373	 {10} That way you may approve the things that are excellent; that you may be sincere and without offense to the day of Christ.
PHP	1	11	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8374	" {11} I pray that you will be filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are through Jesus Christ, to the glory and praise of God."
PHP	1	12	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8375	" {12} Now I desire to have you know, brothers, that the things which happened to me have turned out rather to the progress of the Good News."
PHP	1	13	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8376	" {13} It has become evident to the whole palace guard, and to all the rest, that my bonds are in Christ."
PHP	1	14	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8377	" {14} Most of the brothers in the Lord, being confident through my bonds, are more abundantly bold to speak the word of God without fear."
PHP	1	15	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8378	" {15} Some indeed preach Christ even out of envy and strife, and some also out of good will."
PHP	1	16	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8379	" {16} The former insincerely preach Christ from selfish ambition, thinking that they add affliction to my chains."
PHP	1	17	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8380	" {17} But the latter out of love, knowing that I am appointed for the defense of the Good News."
PHP	1	18	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8381	" {18} What does it matter? Only that in every way, whether in pretense or in truth, Christ is proclaimed. I rejoice in this, yes, and will rejoice."
PHP	1	19	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8382	" {19} For I know that this will turn out to my salvation, through your supplication and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,"
PHP	1	20	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8383	" {20} according to my earnest expectation and hope, that I will in no way be disappointed."
PHP	1	20	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8384	" but with all boldness, as always, now also Christ will be magnified in my body, whether by life, or by death."
PHP	1	21	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8385	" {21} For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain."
PHP	1	22	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8386	" {22} But if I live on in the flesh, this will bring fruit from my work; yet I don't know what I will choose."
PHP	1	23	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8387	" {23} But I am in a dilemma between the two, having the desire to depart and be with Christ, which is far better."
PHP	1	24	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8388	" {24} Yet, to remain in the flesh is more needful for your sake."
PHP	1	25	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8389	" {25} Having this confidence, I know that I will remain, yes, and remain with you all, for your progress and joy in the faith."
PHP	1	26	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8390	 {26} That way your rejoicing may abound in Christ Jesus in me through my presence with you again.
PHP	1	27	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8391	" {27} Only let your way of life be worthy of the Good News of Christ, whether I come and see you or am absent."
PHP	1	27	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8392	" That I may hear of your state, that you stand firm in one spirit, with one soul striving for the faith of the Good News;"
PHP	1	28	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8393	" {28} and in nothing frightened by the adversaries, which is for them a proof of destruction, but to you of salvation, and that from God."
PHP	1	29	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8394	" {29} Because it has been granted to you on behalf of Christ, not only to believe in him, but also to suffer on his behalf."
PHP	1	30	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8395	" {30} You have the same conflict which you saw in me, and now hear is in me. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"

PHP	2	2	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8398	" {2} If so, make my joy full, by being like-minded, having the same love, being of one accord, of one mind;"
PHP	2	3	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8399	" {3} Do nothing through rivalry or through conceit, but in humility, each counting others better than himself."

PHP	3	1	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8430	" {1} Finally, my brothers, rejoice in the Lord. To write the same things to you, to me indeed is not tiresome, but for you it is safe."
PHP	3	2	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8431	" {2} Beware of the dogs, beware of the evil workers, beware of the false circumcision."
PHP	3	3	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8432	" {3} For we are the circumcision, who worship God in the Spirit, and rejoice in Christ Jesus, and have no confidence in the flesh;"
PHP	3	4	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8433	" {4} though I myself might have confidence even in the flesh. If any other man thinks that he has confidence in the flesh, I yet more:"
PHP	3	5	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8434	" {5} circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of Hebrews; concerning the law, a Pharisee."
PHP	3	6	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8435	" {6} Concerning zeal, I persecuted the assembly. Concerning the righteousness which is in the law, I was found blamelss."
PHP	3	7	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8436	" {7} However, what things were gain to me, these have I counted loss for Christ."
PHP	3	8	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8437	" {8} Yes most certainly, and I count all things to be loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus, my Lord,"
PHP	3	8	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8438	" for whom I suffered the loss of all things, and count them nothing but dung, that I may gain Christ,"
PHP	3	9	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8439	" {9} that I may be found in him, not having a righteousness of my own, that which is of the law,"
PHP	3	9	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8440	" but that which is through faith in Christ, the righteousness which is from God by faith;"
PHP	3	10	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8441	" ||| DO NOT COMBINE |||*~*{Music--Ends before v10}*~**~* {10} that I may know him, and the power of his resurrection."

PHP	3	12	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8444	" {12} Not that I have already obtained, or am already made perfect;"
PHP	3	12	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8445	" but I press on, if it is so that I may take hold of that for which also I was taken hold of by Christ Jesus."
PHP	3	13	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8446	" {13} Brothers, I don't regard myself as yet having taken hold, but one thing I do."
PHP	3	13	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8447	" Forgetting the things which are behind, and stretching forward to the things which are before,"
PHP	3	14	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8448	 {14} I press on toward the goal for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
PHP	3	15	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8449	" {15} Let us therefore, as many as are perfect, think this way. If in anything you think otherwise, God will also reveal that to you."
PHP	3	16	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8450	" {16} Nevertheless, to the extent that we have already attained, let us walk by the same rule. Let us mind the same thing."
PHP	3	17	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8451	" {17} Brothers, be imitators together of me, and note those who walk this way, even as you have us for an example."
PHP	3	18	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8452	" {18} For many walk, of whom I told you often, and now tell you even weeping, as the enemies of the cross of Christ,"
PHP	3	19	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8453	" {19} whose end is destruction, whose god is the belly, and whose glory is in their shame, who think about earthly things."
PHP	3	20	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8454	" {20} For our citizenship is in heaven, from where we also wait for a Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ."
PHP	3	21	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8455	" {21} He will change the body of our humiliation to be conformed to the body of his glory,"
PHP	3	21	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8456	" according to the working by which he is able even to subject all things to himself. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"

PHP	4	1	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8458	" {1} Therefore, my brothers, beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, so stand firm in the Lord, my beloved."
PHP	4	2	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8459	" {2} I exhort Euodia, and I exhort Syntyche, to think the same way in the Lord."
PHP	4	3	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8460	" {3} Yes, I beg you also, true yokefellow, help these women,"
PHP	4	3	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8461	" for they labored with me in the Good News, with Clement also, and the rest of my fellow workers, whose names are in the book of life."
PHP	4	4	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8462	" {4} Rejoice in the Lord always! Again I will say, “Rejoice!”"
PHP	4	5	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8463	 {5} Let your gentleness be known to all men. The Lord is at hand.
PHP	4	6	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8464	" {6} In nothing be anxious, but in everything, by prayer and petition with thanksgiving, let your requests be made known to God."
PHP	4	7	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8465	" {7} And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your thoughts in Christ Jesus."
PHP	4	8	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8466	" {8} Finally, brothers, whatever things are true, whatever things are honorable, whatever things are just, whatever things are pure,"
PHP	4	8	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8467	" whatever things are lovely, whatever things are of good report; if there is any virtue, and if there is any praise, think about these things."
PHP	4	9	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8468	" {9} The things which you learned, received, heard, and saw in me: do these things, and the God of peace will be with you."
PHP	4	10	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8469	" {10} But I rejoice in the Lord greatly, that now at length you have revived your thought for me;"
PHP	4	10	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8470	" in which you did indeed take thought, but you lacked opportunity."
PHP	4	11	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8471	" {11} Not that I speak in respect to lack, for I have learned in whatever state I am, to be content in it."
PHP	4	12	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8472	" {12} I know how to be humbled, and I know also how to abound."
PHP	4	12	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8473	" In everything and in all things I have learned the secret both to be filled and to be hungry, both to abound and to be in need."
PHP	4	13	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8474	" {13} I can do all things through Christ, who strengthens me."
PHP	4	14	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8475	 {14} However you did well that you shared in my affliction.
PHP	4	15	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8476	" {15} You yourselves also know, you Philippians, that in the beginning of the Good News, when I departed from Macedonia,"
PHP	4	15	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8477	 no assembly shared with me in the matter of giving and receiving but you only.
PHP	4	16	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8478	 {16} For even in Thessalonica you sent once and again to my need.
PHP	4	17	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8479	" {17} Not that I seek for the gift, but I seek for the fruit that increases to your account."
PHP	4	18	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8480	" {18} But I have all things, and abound."
PHP	4	18	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8481	" I am filled, having received from Epaphroditus the things that came from you, a sweet-smelling fragrance, an acceptable and well-pleasing sacrifice to God."
PHP	4	19	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8482	 {19} My God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.
PHP	4	20	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8483	 {20} Now to our God and Father be the glory forever and ever! Amen.
PHP	4	21	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8484	 {21} Greet every saint in Christ Jesus. The brothers who are with me greet you.
PHP	4	22	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8485	" {22} All the saints greet you, especially those who are of Caesar's household."
PHP	4	23	Narr_011: Philippians	#19		8486	" {23} The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen. *~**~*||| + 5 SECs |||*~*"

COL	1	2	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8489	" {2} to the saints and faithful brothers in Christ at Colossae: Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ."
COL	1	3	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8490	" {3} We give thanks to God the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,"
COL	1	4	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8491	" {4} We thank God for you because we have heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which you have toward all the saints."
COL	1	5	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8492	" {5} We thank God because of the hope which is laid up for you in the heavens, of which you heard before in the word of the truth of the Good News."
COL	1	6	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8493	" {6} The Gospel came to you and is now going out to all the world and is bearing fruit and growing,"
COL	1	6	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8494	" as it does in you also, since the day you heard and knew the grace of God in truth;"
COL	1	7	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8495	" {7} You learned of Epaphras our beloved fellow servant, who is a faithful servant of Christ on our behalf."

COL	1	9	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8497	" {9} For this cause, we also, since the day we heard this, don't cease praying and making requests for you."
COL	1	9	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8498	 That you may be filled with the knowledge of his will in all spiritual wisdom and understanding.

COL	1	12	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8502	" {12} giving thanks to the Father, who made us fit to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light;"
COL	1	13	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8503	" {13} God delivered us out of the power of darkness, and translated us into the Kingdom of the Son of his love;"
COL	1	14	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8504	" {14} In Jesus we have our redemption through his blood, and the forgiveness of our sins;"
COL	1	15	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8505	" {15} Jesus is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of all creation."
COL	1	16	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8506	" {16} For by him all things were created, in the heavens and on the earth, things visible and things invisible,"
COL	1	16	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8507	" whether thrones or dominions or principalities or powers; all things have been created through him, and for him."
COL	1	17	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8508	" {17} He is before all things, and in him all things are held together."
COL	1	18	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8509	" {18} He is the head of the body, the assembly, who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence."
COL	1	19	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8510	 {19} For all the fullness was pleased to dwell in him;
COL	1	20	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8511	" {20} and through him to reconcile all things to himself, by him, whether things on the earth, or things in the heavens,"
COL	1	20	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8512	 having made peace through the blood of his cross.
COL	1	21	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8513	" {21} You, being in past times alienated and enemies in your mind in your evil works,"
COL	1	22	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8514	" {22} yet now he has reconciled in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and without blemish and blameless before him."
COL	1	23	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8515	" {23} This is for you if you continue in the faith, grounded and steadfast, and not moved away from the hope of the Good News which you heard."
COL	1	23	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8516	" The Good News which is being proclaimed in all creation under heaven; of which I, Paul, was made a servant."
COL	1	24	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8517	" {24} Now I rejoice in my sufferings for your sake,"
COL	1	24	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8518	" and fill up on my part that which is lacking of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body's sake, which is the assembly;"
COL	1	25	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8519	" {25} I was made a servant in his church, according to the stewardship of God which was given me toward you, to fulfill the word of God."
COL	1	26	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8520	 {26} This great mystery has been hidden for ages and generations. But now it has been revealed to his saints.
COL	1	27	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8521	" {27} God was pleased to make known the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles, which is Christ in you, the hope of glory."

COL	2	11	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8539	" in the putting off of the body of the sins of the flesh, in the circumcision of Christ;"
COL	2	12	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8540	" {12} When you were baptized you were buried with him and you were also raised with him through faith in the working of God, who raised him from the dead."
COL	2	13	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8541	" {13} You were dead through your trespasses and the uncircumcision of your flesh. He made you alive together with him, having forgiven us all our trespasses,"
COL	2	14	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8542	" {14} wiping out the handwriting in ordinances which was against us; and he has taken it out of the way, nailing it to the cross;"
COL	2	15	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8543	" {15} God stripped the principalities and the powers, he made a show of them openly, triumphing over them in it."
COL	2	16	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8544	" {16} Let no one therefore judge you in eating, or in drinking, or with respect to a feast day or a new moon or a Sabbath day."
COL	2	17	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8545	 {17} These things are a shadow of the things to come; but the body is Christ's.
COL	2	18	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8546	" {18} Let no one rob you of your prize by a voluntary humility and worshipping of the angels, dwelling in the things which he has not seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,"
COL	2	19	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8547	" {19} and not holding firmly to the Head, from whom all the body, being supplied and knit together through the joints and ligaments, grows with God's growth."
COL	2	20	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8548	" {20} If you died with Christ from the elements of the world, why, as though living in the world, do you subject yourselves to ordinances,"
COL	2	21	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8549	" {21} “Don't handle, nor taste, nor touch"""
COL	2	22	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8550	" {22} (all of which perish with use), according to the precepts and doctrines of men?"
COL	2	23	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8551	" {23} Which things indeed appear like wisdom in self-imposed worship, and humility, and severity to the body;"
COL	2	23	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8552	" but aren't of any value against the indulgence of the flesh. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"

COL	3	8	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8562	" {8} Put out of your life these things also: anger, wrath, malice, slander, and shameful speaking out of your mouth."
COL	3	9	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8563	" {9} Don't lie to one another, seeing that you have put off the old man with his doings."
COL	3	10	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8564	 {10} You have now become a new person who is being renewed in knowledge after the image of his Creator.
COL	3	11	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8565	" {11} In this new life there is no difference between Greek and Jew, circumcision and uncircumcision,"
COL	3	11	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8566	" barbarian, Scythian, bondservant, freeman; but Christ is all, and in all."
COL	3	12	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8567	" {12} Put on therefore, as God's chosen ones, holy and beloved, a heart of compassion, kindness, lowliness, humility, and perseverance."
COL	3	13	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8568	" {13} Bear with one another, and forgive each other, if any man has a complaint against any; even as Christ forgave you, so you also do."
COL	3	14	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8569	" {14} Above all these things, walk in love, which is the bond of perfection."
COL	3	15	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8570	" {15} And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to which also you were called in one body; and be thankful."

COL	3	16	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8572	" admonishing one another with psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your heart to the Lord."
COL	3	17	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8573	" {17} Whatever you do, in word or in deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father, through him."
COL	3	18	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8574	" {18} Wives, be in subjection to your husbands, as is fitting in the Lord."
COL	3	19	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8575	" {19} Husbands, love your wives, and don't be bitter against them."
COL	3	20	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8576	" {20} Children, obey your parents in all things, for this pleases the Lord."
COL	3	21	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8577	" {21} Fathers, don't provoke your children, so that they won't be discouraged."
COL	3	22	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8578	" {22} Servants, obey in all things those who are your masters according to the flesh,"
COL	3	22	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8579	" not just when they are looking, as men pleasers, but in singleness of heart, fearing God."
COL	3	23	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8580	" {23} And whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord, and not for men."
COL	3	24	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8581	 {24} Know that from the Lord you will receive the reward of the inheritance; for you serve the Lord Christ.
COL	3	25	Narr_012: Colossians	#19		8582	" {25} But he who does wrong will receive again for the wrong that he has done, and there is no partiality. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"

1TH	1	<<	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8604	"1 THESSALONIANS*~*1 THESSALONIANS CHP 1"
1TH	1	1	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8605	" {1} Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy, to the assembly of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ:"
1TH	1	1	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8606	" Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.*~**~*||| + 1.5 SECs |||*~*"
1TH	1	2	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8607	" {2} We always give thanks to God for all of you, mentioning you in our prayers."
1TH	1	3	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8608	" {3} We remember without ceasing your work of faith and labor of love and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, before our God and Father."
1TH	1	4	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8609	" {4} We know, brothers loved by God, that you are chosen."
1TH	1	5	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8610	" {5} Our Good News came to you not in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Spirit, and with much assurance."
1TH	1	5	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8611	 You know what kind of men we showed ourselves to be among you for your sake.
1TH	1	6	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8612	" {6} You became imitators of us, and of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Spirit."
1TH	1	7	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8613	 {7} Thus you became an example to all who believe in Macedonia and in Achaia.
1TH	1	8	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8614	" {8} For from you the word of the Lord has been declared, not only in Macedonia and Achaia,"
1TH	1	8	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8615	 but also in every place your faith toward God has gone out; so that we need not to say anything.
1TH	1	9	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8616	" {9} For they themselves report concerning us what kind of a reception we had from you; and how you turned to God from idols, to serve a living and true God,"
1TH	1	10	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8617	" {10} and to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead--Jesus, who delivers us from the wrath to come. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
1TH	2	<<	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8618	1 THESSALONIANS CHP 2
1TH	2	1	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8619	" {1} For you yourselves know, brothers, our visit to you wasn't in vain."
1TH	2	2	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8620	" {2} As you know, we suffered and were shamefully treated at Philippi,"
1TH	2	2	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8621	" but with God's help we preached the gospel to you without fear, even in the midst of much conflict."
1TH	2	3	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8622	" {3} For our exhortation is not of error, nor of uncleanness, nor in deception."
1TH	2	4	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8623	" {4} But even as we have been approved by God to be entrusted with the Good News, so we speak; not as pleasing men, but God, who tests our hearts."
1TH	2	5	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8624	" {5} For neither were we at any time found using words of flattery, as you know, nor a cloak of covetousness (God is witness)."
1TH	2	6	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8625	" {6} We did not seek glory from men (neither from you nor from others), when we might have claimed authority as apostles of Christ."
1TH	2	7	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8626	" {7} But we were gentle among you, like a nursing mother cherishes her own children."
1TH	2	8	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8627	" {8} Even so, affectionately longing for you, we were well pleased to impart to you, not the Good News of God only,"
1TH	2	8	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8628	" but also our own souls, because you had become very dear to us."
1TH	2	9	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8629	" {9} For you remember, brothers, our labor and travail;"
1TH	2	9	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8630	" for working night and day, that we might not burden any of you, we preached to you the Good News of God."
1TH	2	10	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8631	" {10} You are witnesses with God, how holy, righteously, and blamelessly we behaved ourselves toward you who believe."
1TH	2	11	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8632	" {11} As you know, we exhorted, comforted, and implored every one of you, as a father does his own children,"
1TH	2	12	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8633	" {12} to the end that you should walk worthily of God, who calls you into his own Kingdom and glory."
1TH	2	13	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8634	" {13} For this cause we also thank God without ceasing, that, when you received from us the word of the message of God,"
1TH	2	13	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8635	" you accepted it not as the word of men, but, as it is in truth, the word of God, which also works in you who believe."
1TH	2	14	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8636	" {14} For you, brothers, became imitators of the assemblies of God which are in Judea in Christ Jesus;"
1TH	2	14	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8637	" for you also suffered the same things from your own countrymen, even as they did from the Jews."
1TH	2	15	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8638	" {15} It was the Jews who killed both the Lord Jesus and their own prophets, and drove us out, and didn't please God, and are contrary to all men."
1TH	2	16	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8639	 {16} They forbade us to speak to the Gentiles that they may be saved; to fill up their sins always. But wrath has come on them to the uttermost.
1TH	2	17	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8640	" {17} But we, brothers, being bereaved of you for a short season, in presence, not in heart, tried even harder to see your face with great desire."
1TH	2	18	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8641	" {18} We wanted to come to you--indeed, I, Paul, once and again--but Satan hindered us."
1TH	2	19	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8642	" {19} For what is our hope, or joy, or crown of rejoicing? Isn't it even you, before our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming?"
1TH	2	20	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8643	" {20} For you are our glory and our joy. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
1TH	3	<<	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8644	1 THESSALONIANS CHP 3
1TH	3	1	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8645	" {1} Therefore when we couldn't stand it any longer, we thought it good to be left behind at Athens alone."
1TH	3	2	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8646	" {2} We sent Timothy, our brother and God's servant in the Good News of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith;"
1TH	3	3	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8647	 {3} that no one be moved by these afflictions. For you know that we are appointed to this task.
1TH	3	4	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8648	" {4} For most certainly, when we were with you, we told you beforehand that we are to suffer affliction, even as it happened, and you know."
1TH	3	5	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8649	" {5} For this cause I also, when I couldn't stand it any longer, sent that I might know your faith,"
1TH	3	5	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8650	" for fear that by any means the tempter had tempted you, and our labor would have been in vain."
1TH	3	6	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8651	" {6} But when Timothy came just now to us from you, and brought us glad news of your faith and love,"
1TH	3	6	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8652	" and that you have good memories of us always, longing to see us, even as we also long to see you."
1TH	3	7	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8653	" {7} For this cause, brothers, we were comforted over you in all our distress and affliction through your faith."
1TH	3	8	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8654	" {8} For now we live, if you stand fast in the Lord."
1TH	3	9	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8655	" {9} For what thanksgiving can we render again to God for you, for all the joy with which we rejoice for your sakes before our God;"
1TH	3	10	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8656	" {10} night and day praying exceedingly that we may see your face, and may perfect that which is lacking in your faith?"
1TH	3	11	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8657	" {11} Now may our God and Father himself, and our Lord Jesus Christ, direct our way to you."
1TH	3	12	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8658	" {12} May the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another, and toward all men, even as we also do toward you."
1TH	3	13	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8659	 {13} May he establish your hearts blameless.
1TH	3	13	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8660	" In holiness before our God and Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
1TH	4	<<	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8661	1 THESSALONIANS CHP 4
1TH	4	1	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8662	" {1} Finally then, brothers, we beg and exhort you in the Lord Jesus,"
1TH	4	1	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8663	" that as you received from us how you ought to walk and to please God, that you abound more and more."
1TH	4	2	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8664	 {2} For you know what instructions we gave you through the Lord Jesus.
1TH	4	3	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8665	" {3} For this is the will of God: your sanctification, that you abstain from sexual immorality."
1TH	4	4	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8666	 {4} God wants each one of you to know how to possess himself of his own vessel in sanctification and honor.
1TH	4	5	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8667	 {5} Do not use your body in the passion of lust as the Gentiles who don't know God do.
1TH	4	6	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8668	 {6} No one should take advantage of and wrong a brother or sister in this matter;
1TH	4	6	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8669	" because the Lord is an avenger in all these things, as also we forewarned you and testified."
1TH	4	7	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8670	" {7} For God called us not for uncleanness, but in sanctification."
1TH	4	8	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8671	" {8} Therefore he who rejects this doesn't reject man, but God, who has also given his Holy Spirit to you."
1TH	4	9	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8672	" {9} But concerning brotherly love, you have no need that one write to you. For you yourselves are taught by God to love one another."
1TH	4	10	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8673	" {10} Indeed you do it toward all the brothers who are in all Macedonia. But we exhort you, brothers, that you abound more and more."
1TH	4	11	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8674	" {11} Make it your ambition to lead a quiet life, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands, even as we instructed you."
1TH	4	12	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8675	" {12} Then you may walk properly toward those who are outside, and may have need of nothing."
1TH	4	13	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8676	" {13} But we don't want you to be ignorant, brothers, concerning those who have fallen asleep, so that you don't grieve like the rest, who have no hope."
1TH	4	14	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8677	" {14} For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so God will bring with him those who have fallen asleep in Jesus."
1TH	4	15	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8678	" {15} For this we tell you by the word of the Lord,"
1TH	4	15	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8679	" that we who are alive, who are left to the coming of the Lord, will in no way precede those who have fallen asleep."
1TH	4	16	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8680	" {16} For the Lord himself will descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with God's trumpet."
1TH	4	16	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8681	 The dead in Christ will rise first.
1TH	4	17	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8682	" {17} Then we who are alive, who are left, will be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air."
1TH	4	17	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8683	 So we will be with the Lord forever.
1TH	4	18	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8684	" {18} Therefore comfort one another with these words. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
1TH	5	<<	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8685	1 THESSALONIANS CHP 5
1TH	5	1	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8686	" {1} But concerning the times and the seasons, brothers, you have no need that anything be written to you."
1TH	5	2	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8687	 {2} For you yourselves know well that the day of the Lord comes like a thief in the night.
1TH	5	3	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8688	" {3} For when they are saying, “Peace and safety,“ then sudden destruction will come on them,"
1TH	5	3	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8689	 like birth pains on a pregnant woman; and they will in no way escape.
1TH	5	4	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8690	" {4} But you, brothers, aren't in darkness, that the day should overtake you like a thief."
1TH	5	5	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8691	" {5} You are all children of light, and children of the day. We don't belong to the night, nor to darkness."
1TH	5	6	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8692	" {6} So then let's not sleep, as everyone else does, but let's watch and be sober."
1TH	5	7	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8693	" {7} For those who sleep, sleep in the night, and those who are drunk are drunk in the night."
1TH	5	8	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8694	" {8} But let us, since we belong to the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love, and, for a helmet, the hope of salvation."
1TH	5	9	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8695	" {9} For God didn't appoint us to wrath, but to the obtaining of salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ."
1TH	5	10	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8696	" {10} Jesus died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him."
1TH	5	11	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8697	" {11} Therefore exhort one another, and build each other up, even as you also do."
1TH	5	12	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8698	" {12} But we beg you, brothers, to know those who labor among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you,"
1TH	5	13	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8699	 {13} and to respect and honor them in love for their work's sake. Be at peace among yourselves.
1TH	5	14	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8700	" {14} We exhort you, brothers, admonish the disorderly, encourage the fainthearted, support the weak, be patient toward all."
1TH	5	15	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8701	" {15} See that no one returns evil for evil to anyone, but always follow after that which is good, for one another, and for all."
1TH	5	16	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8702	 {16} Rejoice always. {17} Pray without ceasing.
1TH	5	18	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8703	" {18} In everything give thanks, for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus toward you."
1TH	5	19	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8704	 {19} Don't quench the Spirit. {20} Don't despise prophesies.
1TH	5	21	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8705	" {21} Test all things, and hold firmly that which is good. {22} Abstain from all appearance of evil."
1TH	5	23	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8706	 {23} May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely.
1TH	5	23	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8707	" May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ."
1TH	5	24	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8708	" {24} He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it."
1TH	5	25	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8709	" {25} Brothers, pray for us. {26} Greet all the brothers with a holy kiss."
1TH	5	27	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8710	 {27} I solemnly command you by the Lord that this letter be read to all the holy brothers.
1TH	5	28	Narr_013: 1Thessalonians	#19		8711	" {28} The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen. *~**~*||| + 5 SECs |||*~*"
2TH	1	<<	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8712	"2nd THESSALONIANS *~*2nd THESSALONIANS CHP 1"
2TH	1	1	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8713	" {1} Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy, to the assembly of the Thessalonians in God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ:"
2TH	1	2	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8714	 {2} Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
2TH	1	3	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8715	" {3} We are bound to always give thanks to God for you, brothers,"
2TH	1	3	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8716	" even as it is appropriate, because your faith grows exceedingly, and the love of each and every one of you towards one another abounds."
2TH	1	4	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8717	 {4} Therefore we ourselves boast about you in the assemblies of God.
2TH	1	4	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8718	 We boast of your patience and faith in all your persecutions and in the afflictions which you endure.
2TH	1	5	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8719	" {5} This is an obvious sign of the righteous judgment of God, to the end that you may be counted worthy of the Kingdom of God, for which you also suffer."
2TH	1	6	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8720	" {6} Since it is a righteous thing with God to repay affliction to those who afflict you,"
2TH	1	7	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8721	 {7} and to give relief to you who are afflicted with us.
2TH	1	7	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8722	 This will happen when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with his mighty angels in flaming fire:
2TH	1	8	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8723	" {8} He will give vengeance to those who don't know God, and to those who don't obey the Good News of our Lord Jesus Christ,"
2TH	1	9	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8724	 {9} They will pay the penalty: eternal destruction from the face of the Lord and from the glory of his might.
2TH	1	10	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8725	" {10} When he comes, his glory will be seen in his saints."
2TH	1	10	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8726	 He will receive honor from all those who put their trust in him. This includes you because you believed our testimony to you.
2TH	1	11	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8727	" {11} To this end we also pray always for you,"
2TH	1	11	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8728	" that our God may count you worthy of your calling, and fulfill every desire of goodness and work of faith, with power."
2TH	1	12	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8729	" {12} In this way, the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you, and you in him."
2TH	1	12	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8730	" According to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
2TH	2	<<	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8731	2 THESSALONIANS CHP 2
2TH	2	1	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8732	" {1} Now, brothers, concerning the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, and our gathering together to him, here is what we ask:"
2TH	2	2	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8733	" {2} Do not be quickly shaken in your mind, nor yet be troubled, either by spirit, or by word."
2TH	2	2	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8734	" Nor by letter as from us, saying that the day of Christ had come."
2TH	2	3	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8735	 {3} Let no one deceive you in any way.
2TH	2	3	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8736	" For it will not be, unless the departure comes first, and the man of sin is revealed. He is the son of destruction."
2TH	2	4	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8737	 {4} He opposes and exalts himself against all that is called God or that is worshiped;
2TH	2	4	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8738	" so that he sits as God in the temple of God, setting himself up as God."
2TH	2	5	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8739	" {5} Don't you remember that, when I was still with you, I told you these things?"
2TH	2	6	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8740	" {6} Now you know what is restraining him, to the end that he may be revealed in his own season."
2TH	2	7	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8741	" {7} For the mystery of lawlessness already works. Only there is one who restrains now, until he is taken out of the way."
2TH	2	8	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8742	" {8} Then the lawless one will be revealed, whom the Lord will kill with the breath of his mouth, and destroy by the manifestation of his coming."
2TH	2	9	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8743	 {9} The coming of the lawless one will be in accordance with the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders.
2TH	2	10	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8744	" {10} Those who are lost in sin will be deceived by the things he can do because they didn't receive the love of the truth, that they might be saved."
2TH	2	11	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8745	" {11} Because of this, God sends them a working of error, that they should believe a lie."
2TH	2	12	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8746	" {12} They will all be judged because they didn't believe the truth, but had pleasure in unrighteousness."
2TH	2	13	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8747	" {13} But we are bound to always give thanks to God for you, brothers loved by the Lord,"
2TH	2	13	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8748	 because God chose you from the beginning for salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief in the truth.
2TH	2	14	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8749	" {14} He called you to this through our Good News, for the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ."
2TH	2	15	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8750	" {15} So then, brothers, stand firm, and hold the traditions which you were taught by us, whether by word, or by letter."
2TH	2	16	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8751	" {16} Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God our Father, who loved us and gave us eternal comfort and good hope through grace,"
2TH	2	17	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8752	" {17} comfort your hearts and establish you in every good work and word. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
2TH	3	<<	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8753	2 THESSALONIANS CHP 3
2TH	3	1	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8754	" {1} Finally, brothers, pray for us, that the word of the Lord may spread rapidly and be glorified, even as also with you;"
2TH	3	2	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8755	 {2} and that we may be delivered from unreasonable and evil men; for not all have faith.
2TH	3	3	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8756	" {3} But the Lord is faithful, who will establish you, and guard you from the evil one."
2TH	3	4	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8757	" {4} We have confidence in the Lord concerning you, that you both do and will do the things we command."
2TH	3	5	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8758	" {5} May the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God, and into the patience of Christ."
2TH	3	6	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8759	" {6} Now we command you, brothers, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ."
2TH	3	6	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8760	" Withdraw yourselves from every brother who walks in rebellion, and not after the tradition which they received from us."
2TH	3	7	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8761	" {7} For you know how you ought to imitate us. For we didn't behave ourselves rebelliously among you,"
2TH	3	8	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8762	 {8} neither did we eat bread from anyone's hand without paying for it.
2TH	3	8	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8763	" In labor and travail we worked night and day, that we might not burden any of you."
2TH	3	9	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8764	" {9} We did this, not because we don't have the right, but to make ourselves an example to you, that you should imitate us."
2TH	3	10	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8765	" {10} For even when we were with you, we commanded you this: “If anyone will not work, neither let him eat.”"
2TH	3	11	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8766	" {11} For we hear of some who walk among you in rebellion, who don't work at all, but are busybodies."
2TH	3	12	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8767	" {12} Now those who are that way, we command and exhort in the Lord Jesus Christ, that with quietness they work, and eat their own bread."
2TH	3	13	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8768	" {13} But you, brothers, don't be weary in doing well."
2TH	3	14	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8769	" {14} If any man doesn't obey our word in this letter, note that man, that you have no company with him, to the end that he may be ashamed."
2TH	3	15	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8770	" {15} Don't count him as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother."
2TH	3	16	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8771	 {16} Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.
2TH	3	17	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8772	" {17} The greeting of me, Paul, with my own hand, which is the sign in every letter: this is how I write."
2TH	3	18	Narr_014: 2Thessalonians	#19		8773	" {18} The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen. *~**~*||| + 5 SECs |||*~*"
1TI	1	<<	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8774	"1 TIMOTHY*~*1 TIMOTHY CHP 1"
1TI	1	1	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8775	" {1} Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus according to the commandment of God our Savior, and Lord Christ Jesus our hope;"
1TI	1	2	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8776	" {2} to Timothy, my true child in faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Christ Jesus our Lord."
1TI	1	3	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8777	" {3} As I urged you when I was going into Macedonia, stay at Ephesus that you might command certain men not to teach a different doctrine,"
1TI	1	4	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8778	" {4} neither to pay attention to myths and endless genealogies, which cause disputes, rather than God's stewardship, which is in faith."
1TI	1	5	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8779	" {5} The goal of this command is love, out of a pure heart and a good conscience and sincere faith."
1TI	1	6	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8780	 {6} Some have wandered away from these things and have turned aside to vain talking.
1TI	1	7	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8781	" {7} They want to be teachers of the law, though they understand neither what they say, nor about what they strongly affirm."
1TI	1	8	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8782	" {8} But we know that the law is good, if a man uses it lawfully."
1TI	1	9	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8783	" {9} We also know that law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and insubordinate,"
1TI	1	9	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8784	" for the ungodly and sinners, for the unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,"
1TI	1	10	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8785	" {10} for the sexually immoral, for homosexuals, for slave-traders, for liars, for perjurers, and for any other thing contrary to the sound doctrine."
1TI	1	11	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8786	" {11} This sound doctrine conforms to the Good News of the glory of the blessed God, and it was entrusted to me."
1TI	1	12	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8787	" {12} And I thank him who enabled me, Christ Jesus our Lord, because he counted me faithful, appointing me to service;"
1TI	1	13	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8788	" {13} Even though before I was a a blasphemer, a persecutor, and insolent, I was shown mercy because I did it ignorantly, in unbelief."
1TI	1	14	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8789	 {14} The grace of our Lord abounded exceedingly with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
1TI	1	15	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8790	" {15} The saying is faithful and worthy of all acceptance, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief."
1TI	1	16	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8791	" {16} However, for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first, Jesus Christ might display all his patience,"
1TI	1	16	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8792	 for an example of those who were going to believe in him for eternal life.
1TI	1	17	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8793	" {17} Now to the King eternal, immortal, invisible, to God who alone is wise, be honor and glory forever and ever. Amen."
1TI	1	18	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8794	" {18} This instruction I commit to you, my child Timothy, according to the prophecies which were once made about you."
1TI	1	18	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8795	 So that by following them you may fight the good fight.
1TI	1	19	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8796	" {19} Keep hold of faith and a good conscience. Some, having thrust these away, have shipwrecked their faith."
1TI	1	20	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8797	" {20} This happened to Hymenaeus and Alexander; whom I delivered to Satan, that they might be taught not to blaspheme. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
1TI	2	<<	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8798	1 TIMOTHY CHP 2
1TI	2	1	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8799	" {1} I exhort therefore, first of all, that petitions, prayers, intercessions, and givings of thanks, be made for all men:"
1TI	2	2	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8800	 {2} for kings and all who are in high places; that we may lead a tranquil and quiet life in all godliness and reverence.
1TI	2	3	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8801	 {3} For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Savior;
1TI	2	4	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8802	 {4} who desires all people to be saved and come to full knowledge of the truth.
1TI	2	5	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8803	" {5} For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus."
1TI	2	6	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8804	 {6} He gave himself as a ransom for all. God made this known to the world at the right time.
1TI	2	7	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8805	" {7} For this purpose, I was appointed a preacher and an apostle."
1TI	2	7	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8806	" (I am telling the truth in Christ, not lying), a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth."
1TI	2	8	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8807	" {8} I desire therefore that the men in every place pray, lifting up holy hands without anger and doubting."
1TI	2	9	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8808	" {9} In the same way, that women also adorn themselves in decent clothing, with modesty and propriety; not just with braided hair, gold, pearls, or expensive clothing;"
1TI	2	10	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8809	 {10} but with good works appropriate for women who profess to worship God.
1TI	2	11	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8810	 {11} Let a woman learn in quietness with all subjection.
1TI	2	12	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8811	" {12} I don't permit a woman to teach, nor to exercise authority over a man, but to be in quietness."
1TI	2	13	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8812	" {13} For Adam was first formed, then Eve."
1TI	2	14	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8813	" {14} Adam wasn't deceived, but the woman, being deceived, has fallen into disobedience."
1TI	2	15	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8814	" {15} But she will be saved through her childbearing, if they continue in faith, love, and sanctification with sobriety. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
1TI	3	<<	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8815	1 TIMOTHY CHP 3
1TI	3	1	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8816	" {1} This is a faithful saying: if a man seeks the office of an overseer, he desires a good work."
1TI	3	2	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8817	" {2} The overseer therefore must be without reproach, the husband of one wife, temperate, sensible, modest, hospitable, good at teaching;"
1TI	3	3	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8818	" {3} not a drinker, not violent, not greedy for money, but gentle, not quarrelsome, not covetous;"
1TI	3	4	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8819	" {4} one who rules his own house well, having children in subjection with all reverence;"
1TI	3	5	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8820	" {5} (If a man doesn't know how to rule his own house, how will he take care of the assembly of God?)"
1TI	3	6	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8821	" {6} He must not be a new convert, lest being puffed up he fall into the same condemnation as the devil."
1TI	3	7	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8822	" {7} Moreover he must have good testimony from those who are outside, to avoid falling into reproach and the snare of the devil."
1TI	3	8	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8823	" {8} Servants, in the same way, must be reverent, not double-tongued, not addicted to much wine, not greedy for money;"
1TI	3	9	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8824	 {9} They must hold the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience.
1TI	3	10	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8825	 {10} Let them also first be tested; then let them serve if they are blameless.
1TI	3	11	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8826	" {11} Their wives in the same way must be reverent, not slanderers, temperate, faithful in all things."
1TI	3	12	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8827	" {12} Let servants be husbands of one wife, ruling their children and their own houses well."
1TI	3	13	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8828	" {13} For those who have served well gain for themselves a good standing, and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus."
1TI	3	14	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8829	" {14} These things I write to you, hoping to come to you shortly;"
1TI	3	15	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8830	" {15} but if I wait long, I want you to know how men ought to behave themselves in God's house."
1TI	3	15	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8831	" It is the assembly of the living God, the pillar and ground of the truth."
1TI	3	16	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8832	" {16} Without controversy, the mystery of godliness is great: God was revealed in the flesh, justified in the spirit,"
1TI	3	16	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8833	" seen by angels, preached among the nations, believed on in the world, and received up in glory. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
1TI	4	<<	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8834	1 TIMOTHY CHP 4
1TI	4	1	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8835	" {1} But the Spirit says expressly that in later times some will fall away from the faith,"
1TI	4	1	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8836	 paying attention to seducing spirits and doctrines of demons.
1TI	4	2	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8837	" {2} Such teachings come through hypocritical liars, whose consciences have been seared as with a hot iron."
1TI	4	3	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8838	 {3} They will forbid marriage and command you to abstain from foods.
1TI	4	3	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8839	 Things which God created to be received with thanksgiving by those who believe and know the truth.
1TI	4	4	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8840	" {4} For every creature of God is good, and nothing is to be rejected, if it is received with thanksgiving."
1TI	4	5	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8841	 {5} For it is sanctified through the word of God and prayer.
1TI	4	6	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8842	" {6} If you instruct the brothers of these things, you will be a good servant of Christ Jesus."
1TI	4	6	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8843	" You will be nourished in the words of the faith, and of the good doctrine which you have followed."
1TI	4	7	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8844	 {7} But refuse profane and old wives' fables. Exercise yourself toward godliness.
1TI	4	8	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8845	" {8} For bodily exercise has some value, but godliness has value in all things, having the promise of the life which is now, and of that which is to come."
1TI	4	9	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8846	 {9} This saying is faithful and worthy of all acceptance.
1TI	4	10	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8847	" {10} For to this end we both labor and suffer reproach, because we have set our trust in the living God."
1TI	4	10	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8848	" He is the Savior of all men, especially of those who believe."
1TI	4	11	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8849	 {11} Command and teach these things.
1TI	4	12	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8850	" {12} Let no man despise your youth; but be an example to those who believe, in word, in your way of life, in love, in spirit, in faith, and in purity."
1TI	4	13	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8851	" {13} Until I come, pay attention to reading, to exhortation, and to teaching."
1TI	4	14	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8852	" {14} Don't neglect the gift that is in you, which was given to you by prophecy, with the laying on of the hands of the elders."
1TI	4	15	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8853	" {15} Be diligent in these things. Give yourself wholly to them, that your progress may be revealed to all."
1TI	4	16	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8854	" {16} Pay attention to yourself, and to your teaching."
1TI	4	16	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8855	" Continue in these things, for in doing this you will save both yourself and those who hear you. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
1TI	5	<<	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8856	1 TIMOTHY CHP 5
1TI	5	1	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8857	" {1} Don't rebuke an older man, but exhort him as a father; the younger men as brothers;"
1TI	5	2	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8858	" {2} the elder women as mothers; the younger as sisters, in all purity."
1TI	5	3	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8859	 {3} Honor widows who are widows indeed.
1TI	5	4	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8860	" {4} But if any widow has children or grandchildren, let them learn first to show piety towards their own family."
1TI	5	4	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8861	" They should first repay their parents, for this is acceptable in the sight of God."
1TI	5	5	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8862	" {5} Now she who is a widow indeed, and desolate, has her hope set on God, and continues in petitions and prayers night and day."
1TI	5	6	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8863	 {6} But she who gives herself to pleasure is dead while she lives.
1TI	5	7	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8864	" {7} Also command these things, that they may be without reproach."
1TI	5	8	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8865	" {8} But if anyone doesn't provide for his own, and especially his own household, he has denied the faith, and is worse than an unbeliever."
1TI	5	9	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8866	" {9} Let no one be enrolled as a widow under sixty years old, having been the wife of one man."
1TI	5	10	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8867	" {10} She must be known for doing good works, if she has brought up children, if she has been hospitable to strangers,"
1TI	5	10	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8868	" if she has washed the saints' feet, if she has relieved the afflicted, and if she has diligently followed every good work."
1TI	5	11	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8869	" {11} But refuse younger widows, for when they have grown wanton against Christ, they desire to marry."
1TI	5	12	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8870	 {12} Thus they bring judgement on themselves because they have rejected their first pledge.
1TI	5	13	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8871	" {13} Besides, they also learn to be idle, going about from house to house."
1TI	5	13	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8872	" Not only idle, but also gossips and busybodies, saying things which they ought not."
1TI	5	14	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8873	" {14} I desire therefore that the younger widows marry, bear children, rule the household, and give no occasion to the adversary for insulting."
1TI	5	15	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8874	 {15} For already some have turned aside after Satan.
1TI	5	16	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8875	" {16} If any man or woman who believes has widows, let them relieve them."
1TI	5	16	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8876	 Don't let the assembly be burdened; that it might relieve those who are widows indeed.
1TI	5	17	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8877	" {17} Let the elders who rule well be counted worthy of double honor, especially those who labor in the word and in teaching. {18} For the Scripture says,"
1TI	5	18	God-FX1	#20		8878	 “You shall not muzzle the ox when it treads out the grain.”
1TI	5	18	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8879	" And,"
1TI	5	18	God-FX1	#20		8880	 “The laborer is worthy of his wages.”
1TI	5	19	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8881	" {19} Don't receive an accusation against an elder, except at the word of two or three witnesses."
1TI	5	20	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8882	" {20} Those who sin, reprove in the sight of all, that the rest also may be in fear."
1TI	5	21	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8883	" {21} I command you in the sight of God, and Lord Christ Jesus, and the chosen angels."
1TI	5	21	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8884	" Observe these things without prejudice, doing nothing by partiality."
1TI	5	22	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8885	" {22} Lay hands hastily on no one, neither be a participant in other men's sins. Keep yourself pure."
1TI	5	23	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8886	" {23} Be no longer a drinker of water only, but use a little wine for your stomach's sake and your frequent infirmities."
1TI	5	24	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8887	" {24} Some men's sins are evident, preceding them to judgment, and some also follow later."
1TI	5	25	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8888	" {25} In the same way also there are good works that are obvious, and those that are otherwise can't be hidden. *~**~*||| + 2 SECs |||*~*"
1TI	6	<<	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8889	1 TIMOTHY CHP 6
1TI	6	1	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8890	" {1} Let as many as are bondservants under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honor, that the name of God and the doctrine not be blasphemed."
1TI	6	2	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8891	" {2} Those who have believing masters, let them not despise them, because they are brothers, but rather let them serve them."
1TI	6	2	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8892	 Those who partake of the benefit are believing and beloved. Teach and exhort these things.
1TI	6	3	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8893	" {3} If anyone teaches a different doctrine, and doesn't consent to sound words, the words of our Lord Jesus Christ, and to the doctrine which is according to godliness,"
1TI	6	4	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8894	" {4} he is conceited, knowing nothing, but obsessed with arguments, disputes, and word battles, from which come envy, strife, insulting, evil suspicions,"
1TI	6	5	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8895	" {5} and constant friction of people of corrupt minds, and destitute of the truth, who suppose that gain is godliness. Withdraw yourself from such."
1TI	6	6	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8896	 {6} But godliness with contentment is great gain.
1TI	6	7	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8897	" {7} For we brought nothing into the world, and we certainly can't carry anything out."
1TI	6	8	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8898	" {8} But having food and clothing, we will be content with that."
1TI	6	9	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8899	" {9} But those who are determined to be rich fall into a temptation and a snare and many foolish and harmful lusts, such as drown men in ruin and destruction."
1TI	6	10	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8900	 {10} For the love of money is a root of all evil.
1TI	6	10	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8901	" Some have been led astray from the faith in their greed, and have pierced themselves through with many sorrows."
1TI	6	11	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8902	" {11} But you, man of God, flee these things, and follow after righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, and gentleness."
1TI	6	12	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8903	 {12} Fight the good fight of faith.
1TI	6	12	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8904	" Lay hold of the eternal life to which you were called, and you confessed the good confession in the sight of many witnesses."
1TI	6	13	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8905	" {13} I command you before God, who gives life to all things, and before Christ Jesus, who before Pontius Pilate testified the good confession."
1TI	6	14	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8906	" {14} Keep the commandment without spot, blameless, until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ;"
1TI	6	15	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8907	" {15} At the right time we will be shown that God is the blessed and only Ruler, the King of kings, and Lord of lords;"
1TI	6	16	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8908	" {16} He alone has immortality, dwelling in unapproachable light; whom no man has seen, nor can see: to whom be honor and eternal power. Amen."
1TI	6	17	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8909	" {17} Charge those who are rich in this present world. They should not be haughty, nor have their hope set on the uncertainty of riches,"
1TI	6	17	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8910	" but on the living God, who richly provides us with everything to enjoy."
1TI	6	18	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8911	" {18} Tell them to do good and to be rich in good works, and to be generous and willing to share."
1TI	6	19	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8912	" {19} In this way they will lay up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come, that they may lay hold of eternal life."
1TI	6	20	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8913	" {20} Timothy, guard that which is committed to you, turning away from the empty chatter and oppositions of science which is falsely so called;"
1TI	6	21	Narr_015: 1Timothy	#19		8914	" {21} Some people have gone after much learning and have erred concerning the faith. Grace be with you. Amen. *~**~*||| + 5 SECs |||*~*"
2TI	1	<<	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8915	"2 TIMOTHY*~*2 TIMOTHY CHP 1"
2TI	1	1	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8916	" {1} Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God, according to the promise of the life which is in Christ Jesus,"
2TI	1	2	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8917	" {2} to Timothy, my beloved child: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord."
2TI	1	3	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8918	" {3} I thank God, whom I serve as my forefathers did, with a pure conscience. How unceasing is my memory of you in my petitions, night and day."
2TI	1	4	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8919	" {4} When I remember your tears, I long to see you, that I may be filled with joy;"
2TI	1	5	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8920	" {5}I remember the sincere faith that is in you; which lived first in your grandmother Lois, and your mother Eunice, and, I am persuaded, it is in you also."
2TI	1	6	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8921	" {6} For this cause, I remind you that you should stir up the gift of God which is in you through the laying on of my hands."
2TI	1	7	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8922	" {7} For God didn't give us a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and self-control."
2TI	1	8	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8923	" {8} Therefore don't be ashamed of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me his prisoner;"
2TI	1	8	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8924	 but endure hardship for the Good News according to the power of God.
2TI	1	9	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8925	" {9} He is the one who saved us and called us with a holy calling, not according to our works,"
2TI	1	9	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8926	" but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given to us in Christ Jesus before times eternal."
2TI	1	10	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8927	" {10} It has been revealed to us now by the appearing of our Savior, Christ Jesus."
2TI	1	10	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8928	" He abolished death, and brought life and immortality to light through the Good News."
2TI	1	11	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8929	" {11} For this, I was appointed as a preacher, an apostle, and a teacher of the Gentiles."
2TI	1	12	Narr_016: 2Timothy	#19		8930	" {12} For this cause I also suffer these things. Yet I am not ashamed, for I know him whom I have believed."
